forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds in a gentle embrace of sunshine, casting a pleasant glow on the cityscape. Temperatures hover comfortably in the mid-sixties, drifting toward a cooler atmosphere as the day progresses. The air, stirred by a mild west-southwest breeze, carries the faintest whispers of the Pacific, making the warmth feel just right against the skin. The skies above, predominantly clear, paint a calming blue backdrop, signaling the dissolution of any morning fog that might have lingered. The iconic outlines of the Golden Gate emerge, sharpened by the sun, while the downtown skyline stands proudly against the horizon, its details visible in crisp clarity.

As evening approaches, the weather will gracefully transition into partly cloudy skies, inviting a cozy ambiance as evening sets in. The cool down to around fifty-four degrees encourages layers—a light jacket or a blend of breathable fabrics would suit well in this soothing climate. Favorable weather invites casual strolls along the waterfront, where gentle waves create a harmonious soundtrack. Or perhaps a quiet moment can be found in a newly discovered café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the gentle sounds of conversation. The charm of San Francisco enlivens the spirit, making this a day rich with serene possibilities, whether venturing outdoors or engaging in intimate gatherings with friends.
